text: mattu avaru (sahōdararu) raktada nakali kalegaḷidda, avara (yūsuph‌ra) aṅgiyannu tandaru. Āga avaru (tande) hēḷidaru; nijavāgi nim'ma cittagaḷu nimagāgi ondu viṣayavannu (kaṭṭu katheyannu) racisikoṭṭive. (Āddarinda) sahaneyē uttama. Nīvu ēnannu hēḷuttiruvirō ā viṣayadalli (nanage) allāhanu neravāgali
